title: A Little Princess (Part 18)
description: The Magic that transformed Sara's attic room into a comfortable sanctuary remains—and grows stronger. Fortified by delicious food and deep sleep, Sara tends to her chores with a revived spirit and a spring in her step. Miss Minchin grows angry, while the servants and students grow confused and curious: How can Sara be so cheerful, living the miserable life of a drudge? Only Sara and Becky know the truth, as they return to their attic rooms and are met with a host of additional delights.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
